67aae785-49ac-41a8-8ab8-935a39934412.name: 特化
67aae785-49ac-41a8-8ab8-935a39934412.notes: @一 纲生物（如“哺乳类”或“鸟类”）@

ca5ae460-7341-45a5-86e7-ff0d4a903685.name: 特化
ca5ae460-7341-45a5-86e7-ff0d4a903685.notes: @一科生物（如“猫科动物”或“鹦鹉科动物”）@

fa4973fc-c184-4232-b6eb-1a770c349765.name: 特化
fa4973fc-c184-4232-b6eb-1a770c349765.notes: @一种生物（如“家猫”或“金刚鹦鹉”）@

9aa1537e-f249-4888-b369-63260944a3fa.name: 战斗反射
9aa1537e-f249-4888-b369-63260944a3fa.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

0da04a46-4d07-4f2c-ab26-c9309de6e372.name: 健康
0da04a46-4d07-4f2c-ab26-c9309de6e372.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

5678b9f8-5d23-4918-86d5-78047d5974ee.name: Fit, Very
5678b9f8-5d23-4918-86d5-78047d5974ee.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

423ca101-a7b9-4271-8dd7-213429fbd5b1.name: 幸运
423ca101-a7b9-4271-8dd7-213429fbd5b1.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

6547fed6-73c9-45b2-a662-99a3d50e59f0.name: Luck, Extraordinary
6547fed6-73c9-45b2-a662-99a3d50e59f0.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

1d2a7ea8-66df-42ac-9c58-6685bf8d03a3.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

4ecc1226-af29-4632-b08b-7db178d1dcab.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

237db556-fa50-4d67-b47b-4528782ff727.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

98f7be47-df61-41c5-b2f3-82422fc555c1.name: Weapon Bond
98f7be47-df61-41c5-b2f3-82422fc555c1.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

d070a97f-c204-4acb-a6b8-0ba0957fcaaf.name: 高痛阈
d070a97f-c204-4acb-a6b8-0ba0957fcaaf.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

ba92818c-602f-4416-8c68-4229a2996ec0.name: Social Stigma (Barbarian)
ba92818c-602f-4416-8c68-4229a2996ec0.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction by Barbarians

085b9240-6cfa-4e63-97eb-0bcce45adba2.notes: Split DR: DR2 against crushing attacks; roll 1d when hit, only protects on 1-3

6c1b7afe-86a3-4122-ae63-17a0fa33fc46.notes: Split DR: DR2 against crushing attacks; roll 1d when hit, only protects on 1-3

d866a269-8277-43b6-8206-90a13ac158ed.notes: May get stuck on spike thrust; see Picks (p. B405).

a58c1ace-80a4-4a8a-9818-e8795588dd97.notes: Attempts to parry flails and kusaris are at -4; fencing weapons (“F” parry) can’t parry at all! Attempts to block such weapons are at -2.

13443d1c-e2b2-4657-949c-ba50bb2acbba.text: For the Barbarian loadout, several loadout combinations require points in Signature Gear or traded for cash.  See DF13:8 for more information.
